item.title: MacOS update could not be installed
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Tonight after a routine MacOS update (10.13.2) disaster struck and my Mac got stuck in an update boot loop. After a few hours of panic, reading online and trial & error I managed to resolve it.
